# Bidgear

## Examples

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  type="bidgear"
  data-zoneid="PLACE_HOLDER">
  </amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

**Required:**

`width` + `height` - Required for all `<amp-ad>` units. Specifies the ad size.

`type` - Always set to "bidgear".

`data-zoneid`: Zone Id.
